plot: Marge leads a crusade against a local burlesque house after she discovers Bart working there.

Whilst Marge and Lisa are at the coast helping to clean up after an oil spill, Bart, left to his own devices, comes upon a house of ill repute and soon ends up working on the door. Marge is appalled to find that Homer knew but did nothing to stop his son and leads a deputation of local citizens demanding its closure, culminating in her accidentally bull-dozing it.—don @ minifie-1
